error_network: Poor network connection detected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error_unauthorized: Request Missing Authorization, ensure you are logged in
select_contact_no_permission: No permissions granted to access contacts list
DEVICE_DOES_NOT_BELONG_TO_USER: Device Does Not Belong To User
USER_WITH_THIS_USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: User With This Username Already Exists
USER_WITH_CIF_ALREADY_REGISTERED: User With This CIF Already Registered
REGISTERED_MOBILE_NUMBER_DOES_NOT_EXIST: Registered Mobile Number Does Not Exist
MAX_ATTEMPTS_USER_ACCOUNT_LOCKED: Maximum Attempts Reached. User Account Locked
MUST_VALIDATE_AT_LEAST_TWO_SECURITY_QUES: Validate At Least Two Security Questions

initialScreen.comment: Quickly verify your proof of payment
initialScreen.text_continue_registration: We detected unfinished registration with username **userName** on this device. Would you like to Continue with it or Start Over?
initialScreen.error_unauthorized: Request Missing Authorization, ensure you are logged in

setupUserName.head: Sign up
setupUserName.text:
To setup your online account you first need to create a unique username.
Make sure you remember the username you choose as you will use it to login.
setupUserName.help: Must be at least 7 characters long.
setupUserName.error: User name is not unique. Please try creating a different username.
setupUserName.error_accountCanNotBeVerified: Your account cannot be verified. Please check your data.

setupPassword.head: Create password
setupPassword.text: Create a secure password for your SBS online account. Make sure you remember this password as you will use it to login to your account.
setupPassword.text_explanation:
Password must contain at least 
1 special character
1 uppercase letter
1 lowercase letter
1 Digit
setupPassword.check: Your passwords do not match. Try again
setupPassword.help: Must be at least 11 characters, with 1 number and 1 special character $%@

setupYourProfile.head: Sign Up
setupYourProfile.text: To get started please enter your SBS account details. To verify your account we will send an OTP to your mobile number.
setupYourProfile.error: Your account cannot be verified./nPlease contact your nearest SBS branch.
setupYourProfile.error_pleaseEnterSbsAccountNumber: Please enter your SBS Account Number
setupYourProfile.error_pleaseEnterPersonalIdentityNumber: Please enter your Personal identification Number

OTP.text_pleaseEnterOTP: Please enter the code we have sent to
OTP.text_pleaseEnterOTP_your_phone: Please enter the code we have sent to your phone
OTP.text_optResentOK: OTP Code Resent, Please Try Validate Again
OTP.text_optResentFailed: Failed to Resend the OTP, Please Contact Bank

secQuestion.head: Security question
secQuestion.text:
In order to secure your account we need you to select and answer some security questions.
If you get locked out of your account we will use these questions for verification.

Login.login_text: Enter your password to log into your account or alternatively log in using biometrics, if enabled.

setupNotificationsScreen.head: Do you want to know more
setupNotificationsScreen.text: We want to let you know about new features, offers and rewards...

biometricsScreen.head: Biometrics
biometricsScreen.text1: Keep your account secture with biometric identification.
biometricsScreen.text2: Use your phone settings to set-up fingerprint or face ID verification.
biometricsScreen.text3: Enabling biometirics ensures that all transactions are authorised by you. Biometric verification keeps your account secure.

QuickLinksScreen.head: Do your banking faster!
QuickLinksScreen.text1:
Add your most used transactions like buying airtime or making account transfers, 
to your app as quick links.
Allowing you access with just one tap!
QuickLinksScreen.text2: Go to Menu >  App preferences > Customise quick links.

LoggedOut.button_register: Not you? Login to another account

LoginAgain.login_text: Enter your password to log into your account or alternatively log in using biometrics, if enabled.

BeneficiaryDeletedOKScreen.head: Beneficiary Deleted
BeneficiaryDeletedOKScreen.text:
The beneficiary ‘%USERNAME%’ has been removed from your account. 

You will see be able to see any previous transactions made to saved beneficiaries under your purchase history.

BeneficiaryDetails.delete_dialog_head: Your are about to delete a beneficiary.
BeneficiaryDetails.delete_dialog_text:
The beneficiary ‘%USERNAME%’ will be permanently removed from your account. Please confirm that you would like to delete this beneficiary?

Note that this process cannot be reversed.

OnceOffPaymentSelectAccount.head: Select an account
OnceOffPaymentSelectAccount.text: Select the account you would like to transfer money from

EPocketSelectAccount.head: Select an account
EPocketSelectAccount.text: Select the account you would like to transfer money from

CustomizeLoginScreen.head: Do your banking faster!
CustomizeLoginScreen.text1:
Add your most used transactions like buying airtime or making account transfers, 
to your app as quick links.
Allowing you access with just one tap!
CustomizeLoginScreen.text2: Go to Menu >  App preferences > Customise quick links.

CustomiseQuickLinksScreen.head: Customise quick links
CustomiseQuickLinksScreen.header_text: Quick links will appear on your app dashboard and on your app login screen for easy access. You can set up you quick links by using the toggle to turn them on and off.
CustomiseQuickLinksScreen.header_text_web: Quick links will appear on your app dashboard and on your app login screen for easy access. You are using web version of SBS app you you will see all available quick links on a screen at once.
CustomiseQuickLinksScreen.footer_text: Use the easy drag and drop feature to update the order of your quick links and choose the order you want your links to display.
CustomiseQuickLinksScreen.snack_bar_more: You can't set up more than six sitelinks
CustomiseQuickLinksScreen.snack_bar_more_web: You set up more than six sitelinks and this will work on web
CustomiseQuickLinksScreen.snack_bar_less: You to have a minimum of three quick links selected.

VerifyPOP.head: Verify your Proof of Payment
VerifyPOP.header_text: Enter the auth number to verify your proof of payment is an SBS transaction.
VerifyPOP.footer_text:
Your proof of payment has been verified as a 
Swaziland Building Society transaction.

SetupPartial.head: Congrats on signing up!
SetupPartial.text: To continue with your in branch registration, please follow the next steps to complete your new App profile and device setup.

AppPreferencesScreen.head: App preferences
AppPreferencesScreen.settings_title: You want to turn notifications off?
AppPreferencesScreen.settings_text: You can turn notifications off from your device's settings

ChangePasswordScreen.head: Change your password
ChangePasswordScreen.text_reset:
A temporary password has been sent to you.
Enter your temporary password and then create
your new password for your account.

ChangePasswordConfirmScreen.head: New password saved!
ChangePasswordConfirmScreen.text:
Your new password has been successfully
saved. You can use this password to login.

ForgotPasswordUserName.head: Forgot your password?
ForgotPasswordUserName.text: Please enter the username you created when you registered for SBS mobile banking.

Select.head: Select an account
Select.text_head_from: Select the account you would like to transfer money from
Select.text_head_to: Select the account you would like to transfer money to

EPocketAuthorisePendingSendMoneyConfirma.head: Authorise send money
EPocketAuthorisePendingSendMoneyConfirma.text: Authorising this payment will process the transaction.

EPocketAuthorisePendingCashoutConfirmed.head: Cash out confirmed
EPocketAuthorisePendingCashoutConfirmed.text:
Receive your cashout from your agent: %AGENT_NAME% | %AGENT_PHONE% for your cash out amount: %CURRENCY% %AMOUNT%

Your ePocket balance is now: %CURRENCY% %NEW_BALANCE%
EPocketAuthorisePendingCashoutConfirmed.text_cancelled:
Your cashout from your agent: %AGENT_NAME% | %AGENT_PHONE% Has been cancelled!

Your ePocket balance is: %CURRENCY% %NEW_BALANCE%

EPocketAuthorisePendingCashoutsConfirmat.head: OTP Verification
EPocketAuthorisePendingCashoutsConfirmat.text:
We have sent a code to your agents number
%AGENT_PHONE_NUMBER%

ePocketRequestMoney.head: Request money
ePocketRequestMoney.cancel_dialog_text: Would you like to cancel your pending send money request made to %USERNAME%?

ePocketATMCashout.head: Cash out from ATM
ePocketATMCashout.text: How to cash out at an ATM?
ePocketATMCashout.instruction:
1. Generate your PIN
2. Go to an ATM
3. Select amount for cash out %AVAILABLE_BALLANCE%
ePocketATMCashout.tap_to_generate: Tap on the button to generate your PIN

ePocketAgentCashout.head: Cash out with agent
ePocketAgentCashout.text: To confirm your agent is registered for cash out please first validate with the agent’s mobile number.
ePocketAgentCashout.text_select_amount: Enter the amount you would like to withdraw from the agent. Confirm with the agent first that they have enough cash to supply the correct amount.

ePocketConfirmAgentCashout.head: Confirm cash out with agent
ePocketConfirmAgentCashout.funds_ready: Funds are ready to be sent

form.help_text_account: Enter your unique service or reference number.
form.accountError: Account number has already been saved.
form.delete_dialog_head: Your are about to delete a saved biller.
form.delete_dialog_text:
Please confirm if you would like to proceed and delete "%NAME%" from your list of saved billers.

Note that this process cannot be reversed.
form.delete_result_text:
%NAME% has been deleted as a saved biller. 

You will still be able to see any previous transactions made to this saved biller under your purchase history.

AddWaterAccount.head: Save a new water account
AddWaterAccount.name: Name
AddWaterAccount.water_provider_explained: We are currently only providing payments to Eswatini Water Services Corporation
AddWaterAccount.water_account_number_explained: Please enter you 9 digit account number
AddWaterAccount.water_account_save_error: Water Account could not be saved!
AddWaterAccount.water_account_update_error: Water Account could not be updated!

WaterAccountDetails.head: Water account details
WaterAccountDetails.delete_dialog_head: Your are about to delete a saved water account.
WaterAccountDetails.delete_dialog_text:
Please confirm if you would like to proceed and delete "%NAME%" from your list of saved water accounts.

Note that this process cannot be reversed.

deletedOk.head: Beneficiary Deleted
deletedOk.text:
The beneficiary ‘%USERNAME%’ has been removed from your account. 

You will see be able to see any previous transactions made to saved beneficiaries under your purchase history.

Cards.head: Cards
Cards.cancel_text:
You are about to cancel your card.
 This process cannot be reversed. 

If your card has been lost or stolen you can cancel it immidiately by selecting CANCEL NOW. 

Contact your nearest branch for further assistance or to arrange a new card.

LockYourCard.head: Lock your card
LockYourCard.head_text: Temporarily lock your card. If you are having issues with your card please contact your bank.
LockYourCard.unlock_dialog_text: This card is locked. Do you want to unlock your card?
LockYourCard.unlock_dialog_error_text: We were unable to process your request. Please try again or contact support if this issue persists.

ManageLinkedAccounts.head: Manage linked accounts
ManageLinkedAccounts.head_text:
Link accounts to your card so that you can access account functionality at SBS ATM’s.

Your primary account will be the account that is used for card payments in stores and at other vendors.
ManageLinkedAccounts.primary_dialog_head_text: Would you like to change the primary account on your %CARD% card from %FROM% Account to %TO% Account.
ManageLinkedAccounts.linked_dialog_head_text: Please confirm that you would like to link your %NAME% Account to your %CARD% Card?
ManageLinkedAccounts.unlinked_dialog_head_text: Please confirm that you would like to unlink your %NAME% Account from your %CARD% Card?
ManageLinkedAccounts.dialog_head_error_text: We were unable to process your request. Please try again or contact support if this issue persists.

ManageLimitsCard.head: Manage limits
ManageLimitsCard.limit_field_help: Min SZL %MIN% with a Max SZL %MAX%
ManageLimitsCard.error_head: Card limits could not be saved!
ManageLimitsCard.dialog_head_text:
All limits un your %CARD% card will be changed to default values.

 Are you sure?

OnceOffWaterPayment.head: Pay once-off water account
OnceOffWaterPayment.water_provider_explained: We are currently only providing payments to Eswatini Water Services Corporation
OnceOffWaterPayment.water_account_number_explained: Please enter you 9 digit account number

AddElectricityMeter.meter_account_number_explained: Please enter you 9 digit account number

AddElectricityMeter.electricity_account_update_error: Electricity meter could not be updated!

BuyBundleAuthorise.footer_text: Accepting this purchase will process the transaction.

TravelAuthorizationScreen.head: Manage foreign travel
TravelAuthorizationScreen.save_failure_head: Travel details could not be saved!
TravelAuthorizationScreen.cancel_failure_head: Travel cancellation could not be deactivated!

cancel_dialog.head: De-activate travel authorisation
cancel_dialog.text:
You are about to de-activate your set travel authorisation settings.

Continuing will remove any previously set dates and countries set. Would you like to continue?

MultiplySelectCountriesScreen.head: Select your countries
MultiplySelectCountriesScreen.select_up_to_9_countries: Select up to 9 countries, including stop-over countries.

ForgotUsername.head: Forgot User Name?
ForgotUsername.text:
Please enter your PID below, 
then you will be asked two security questions. User Name and temporary password will be sent to you via SMS

ForgotUsernameSecurityQuestions.head: Please answer questions below
ForgotUsernameSecurityQuestions.validation_attempts_exceeded:
You have exceeded number of attempts,
please contact bank support

ForgotUsernameConfirmedValidation.head: Security Questions Confirmed
ForgotUsernameConfirmedValidation.text: Please check your email/SMS for temporary login credentials
ForgotUsernameConfirmedValidation.completion_error:
Error completing Forgot Username flow,
try again later or contact bank support
